text:
<style ....>
   <param name="version" expression="${build.number}"/>
</style>

always passes the string ${build.number} to the stylesheet, even when the 
property is set.
creator: xxxxxxyyyyyy171@hotmail.com
bodewig@apache.org
text:
Can you <echo> build.number just before that task?  I'm rather sure that there is
a typo in the property name or something similar as expanding properties for
attributes happens as an extremely low level and is no different between the nested
param element of style or any other XML element in Ant.
